mapper.insert: insert into REPORTS (R_NUM, R_CATEGORY, R_SENDER, R_RECEIVER, R_CONTENT, R_DATE, R_ILLEGALID, R_IMG, R_ORGIMG) values (R_NUM_SEQ.nextval,#{R_CATEGORY},#{R_SENDER}, #{R_RECEIVER}, #{R_CONTENT}, sysdate, #{R_ILLEGALID}, #{R_IMG, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{R_ORGIMG, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, R_NUM,R_CATEGORY, R_SENDER,R_RECEIVER,R_CONTENT, R_DATE,R_ILLEGALID, R_IMG,R_ORGIMG
from (select * from REPORTS order by R_NUM asc ) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 5 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 5)
